item.description:
Playing at 9, 10, 11am. no games Easter Sunday or Memorial Day weekend

We need women for Monday Woburn 5-v-5 league that starts April 8, playing at 7:30 and 8:30pm. No games Memorial Day weekend.

We need women for Thursday Woburn 5-v-5 league that starts April 4, playing at 8 and 9pm

Signing up teams and individuals for Sunday outdoor 11-v-11 coed recreational soccer, playing Sundays May - end of July.

Signing up teams and individuals for Sunday/Wed coed rec softball and for Tues/Thurs coed rec softball playing May - end of July.
One Tues/Thurs team needs men and women. Slow pitch.
